case.title: Pretend to be my Boyfriend - 34
case.text:
I am looking for a Bengali guy to pretend date me. Hope you are a good actor.
* Be at least 5ft 8" tall * Speak English fluently * Be intelligent * Be single * Have a car * Must like and respect women * Must have good personal hygiene (You must smell good, have nice teeth and dress well)
If you fit these requirements and are interested please reply to post with your rate and send a photo of yourself.
